item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Manuel A cloud architect | developer | engineer and everything in between. Contact In chronological order: F.Bar, J.Doe: Effects of having a placeholder of a name S.Holmes, J.Watson: Consequences of living with a sociopath in London Find me This is a link. Something italics and something bold. Here is a table: Year Award Category 2014 Emmy Won Outstanding Lead Actor in a miniseries or a movie 2015 BAFTA Nominated for Best Leading Actor for Sherlock 2014 Satellite Won Best Actor miniseries or television film Here is a horizontal rule:

item.title: About
item.description: About me I used to be a Web Backend Developer and have built alot of CMS Systems in Python/DJango and the django-cms. Before that i have done way to much PHP and Wordpress/Typo3 then i like to admit. So PHP/Python are the languages i am most familiar with. I’ve done enough JavaScript to know i’m not missing it and to little golang to say i’m good at it. Cloud Architect For the last 5 years i’ve moved to infrastructure development in AWS.

item.title: About Hugo
item.description: About me I used to be a Web Backend Developer and have built alot of CMS Systems in Python/DJango and the django-cms. I’ve done enough JavaScript to know i’m not missing it and to little golang to say i’m good at it. Cloud Architect For the last 5 years i’ve moved to infrastructure development in AWS.
